item.description: ![[notes/images/stochastic-parrots.png]] Retrospective Problem: presented as knowledge access systems; similar to issue w/ meta galactica for science Language: pairs of form and meaning, language models only have access to form Good at generating plausible sounding text; refined w/ preferences at producing non-offensive plausible sounding text Philosophers asking: â€œare the models thinking?
